    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1196</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Hineni! Shmuel’s First Prophecy1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hineni! Shmuel?s Erstes Prophecy1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hineni ! Shmuel?s Premier Prophecy1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hineni! Shmuel?s Primeiro Prophecy1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Hineni! Shmuel?s Primo Prophecy1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Hineni! Shmuel?s πρώτο Prophecy1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Hineni! Shmuel?s Primer Prophecy1</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this MI lesson, learners study the story of Shmuel’s first prophecy and then express the storyline in drama/creative writing/art.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">shmuel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">prophecy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bible</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tanach</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">jewish studies</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser MI Lektion studieren Anfänger die 
Geschichte Shmuel?s der ersten Prophezeiung und drücken dann das 
storyline in drama/creative writing/art aus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En cette leçon de MI, les étudiants étudient 
l'histoire de la première prophétie de Shmuel?s et puis expriment 
le storyline dans drama/creative writing/art.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição do MI, os learners estudam a 
história da primeira profecia de Shmuel?s e expressam então o 
storyline em drama/creative writing/art.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione di MI, i principianti studiano 
la storia di primo prophecy di Shmuel?s ed allora esprimono lo 
storyline in drama/creative writing/art.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το MI μάθημα, οι αρχάριοι μελετούν την 
ιστορία της πρώτης προφητείας Shmuel?s και εκφράζουν έπειτα το
storyline στο δράμα/το δημιουργικές γράψιμο/την τέχνη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección del MI, los principiantes 
estudian la historia de la primera profecía de Shmuel?s y después 
expresan el storyline en drama/creative writing/art.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">shmuel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prophezeiung</string>
          </keyword>
